placeholders.CPP_TASK_ACTIVITY: Construction of a 10-storey commercial building with underground parking, including structural steelwork, concrete cores, and curtain wall installation. Key phases include demolition, excavation, piling, substructure, superstructure, and fit-out.
placeholders.CPP_DELIVERIES_TEXT: Deliveries scheduled between 07:00-19:00. All vehicles to report to site security. Maximum vehicle size: articulated lorry. Designated unloading area on west side of site.
